contents.words: Looks like the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} are dead set on taking over {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}'s territory.  A small group of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}-aligned troops is holding down a key spot, and it's our job to back them up.  Link up with them and push back any {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces that come your way.
